General.Name: Venzee Technologies Inc
General.Description: Venzee Technologies Inc. develops and markets a cloud-based artificial intelligence platform. The company's platform is used for suppliers and manufactures in various industries to share their product information and inventory updates to the retailers under the Mesh Connectors name. It operates in the United States and internationally. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 170-422 Richards Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 2Z4
